name: Two-tone fabric and leather Flow Runner sneakers
description: Sneakers realized in fabric with nappa leather and suede inserts enriched by leather logoed patch on the side and leather logoed label on the tongue.- Lace-up closure- Padded ankle- Printed logo on the inside

name: Turquoise rubber slippers
description: Slippers realized in rubber characterized by contrasting printed logo in relief on the band. - Moulded sole - Embossed logo on the inside
